title: New: Cloud Boat – Youthern
content:
Book Of Hours is the name of Cloud Boats‘ new album, due out on R&S inprint Apollo, early next month.

We’ve been gifted a new track from the album in the form of this minimal yet supremely eloquent cut, Youthern. We’ve seen a remarkable shift in the duos writing focus in the lead up to the album, Cloud Boat now seem to be completely focused on writing ‘songs’, and frankly they’re infinitely better for it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
